verses.verse: In Judah, <S%H3063><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is known. <S%H3045><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
His tabernacle <S%H5520><s%> is also in Salem; <S%H8004><s%> His dwelling place <S%H4585><s%> in Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

There he broke <S%H7665><s%> the flaming arrows <S%H7565><s%> of the bow, <S%H7565><s%> the shield, <S%H4043><s%> and the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the weapons of war. <S%H4421><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Glorious <S%H215><s%> are you, <S%H117><s%> and excellent, more than mountains <S%H2042><s%> of game. <S%H2964><s%>

Valiant <S%H47><s%> men lie plundered, <S%H7997><s%> they have slept <S%H5123><s%> their last sleep. <S%H8142><s%> None of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H2428><s%> can lift <S%H4672><s%> their hands. <S%H3027><s%>
At your rebuke, <S%H1606><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> both chariot <S%H7393><s%> and horse <S%H5483><s%> are cast into a deep sleep. <S%H7290><s%>
You, <S%H3372><s%> even you, are to be feared. Who can stand <S%H5975><s%> in your sight <S%H6440><s%> when <S%H227><s%> you are angry? <S%H639><s%>
You pronounced <S%H8085><s%> judgment <S%H1779><s%> from heaven. <S%H8064><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> feared, <S%H3372><s%> and was silent, <S%H8252><s%>
when God <S%H430><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> to judgment, <S%H4941><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> all the afflicted <S%H6035><s%> ones of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Surely the wrath <S%H2534><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> praises <S%H3034><s%> you. <S%H7611><s%> The survivors of your wrath <S%H2534><s%> are restrained. <S%H2296><s%>

Make vows <S%H5087><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and fulfill <S%H7999><s%> them! <S%H5439><s%> Let all of his neighbors bring <S%H2986><s%> presents <S%H7862><s%> to him who is to be feared. <S%H4172><s%>
He will cut off <S%H1219><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of princes. <S%H5057><s%> He is feared <S%H3372><s%> by the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
